Texte_etudiant_1:
since few  (2years)I have been studying in plant breeding what fascinates me the most is the introduction of biotechnologies to give the plant new traits of resistance to diseases .With QTLs, it becomes possible for each individual to associate a value to a chromosome segment based on the genetic value of the QTL. Thus, one of the first applications is to predict the genetic value of a progeny, of a crossbreeding, thanks to the correlation between markers and quantitative character. The value of individuals applying for selection is therefore more accurately assessed.Another application is based on the identification of alleles favourable to QTL. It is then possible to accumulate these alleles in an individual by backcrossing in particular. This is called genotype construction.

A better knowledge of the modes of action of QTLs, i.e. the identification of stages of the infectious cycle on which they act, make it possible to optimize the strategies of combination and deployment of resistance locus to increase resistance levels resistance in plants and   to preserve the effectiveness of resistance by limiting adaptation pathogenic populations

Moreover thanks to this practise we can improve the quality of fruits at differents steps on flavor ,taste, and texture
Texte_etudiant_2: Concerning inconvenients it's difficult to have acces at the practise considering the cost of developpement who is important , but also there are overestimated effects(stability qtl).But for me it's a progress for the agriculture today because many fruits don't have the quality consumers expect.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences de la vie et de l'environnement

Texte_etudiant_1: Since few years, a new technic has been developed in molecular genetic which have accelerated genetic progress. It calls  CRISPER Cas 9 and it also named molecular scissors. It’s a new technic which allow to eliminate or edit expression of a gene in DNA. It composed of a sequence of DNA. This sequence recognizes a specific place in DNA which correspond to a specific gene. An enzyme called Cas9 cut DNA at the specific place. The CRISPER system allows to repair DNA and to form a recombined DNA.
Texte_etudiant_2: To my mind, this innovation revolutionized the world genetic. Today it’s begun a frequent tool in laboratory to ameliorate variety for example. CRISPER-Cas9 application is more fast than other methods. Before this technic, to obtain recombined DNA, we need to pass to reproduction. This latest method needs many times because reproduction needs many generations. CRISPER-Cas9 target a specific place of DNA, it’s more accurate than other mutagenesis technics.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences de la vie et de l'environnement

Texte_etudiant_1: CRISPR-cas9 is a new technology destined to modified the DNA of cells with accurate location. CRISPR-cas9 is a proteic complex from a bacterium which able to it to pick-up a part of pathogens which attack it. At a later other attack, the bacterium could recognise the pathogens which have the same part of the first one and cut the DNA of its agressor. The scientists use this capacity to cut the DNA of an interested plant in order to switch off a gene or to insert a new gene. Then the DNA past the wound. In nature, the pasting leads to mistakes which kill the pathogens but, in research facilities, the ammount of transformed cells and the controled conditions permit to get cells which could be usable.
Texte_etudiant_2: This technology is a good way to replace the old GMOs which contain antibiotic resistance genes used for the selection of the good transformed plants. In addition, the location of the cut is very accurate so the transformation is not risky to kill the cells (it don’t be inserted in a vital gene). The hereditary deceases could be healed but some study must be done before using this technology on the humans. Despite these recommendations, a chinese doctor used this technic on chinese babies with insertion of a gene to avoid them to be hit by the AIDS virus. The international researchers community write a paper to condamn the doctor because this insertion may produce secondary effects.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences de la vie et de l'environnement

Texte_etudiant_1: Plant transgenesis or gene delivery is the process of modifying the genome of plant by introducing one or more foreign genes artificially. This can be done with several genetic engineering methods including direct transformation technics like biolistics or Agrobacterium tumefaciens mediated transformation technic. Before all, a gene of interest in engineered in vitro usually in a bacterial system (Escherichia coli). For indirect transformation with A. tumefaciens, mostly used method, the engineered gene is then inserted in a plasmidic vector and introduced to A. tumefaciens. Thanks to a particular plasmid (Ti plasmid), existing only in A. tumefaciens species, the inserted gene can be transferred to the nuclear genome of host plant tissues (grown in vitro) sine they are exposed to each other. Plants can be regenerated from the transformed plant tissues and tested for the introduced gene expression.
Texte_etudiant_2: The development of plant transgenesis technics revolutionized crop genetic improvement field. Actually, traditional gene selective breeding programmes implies many years to create one interesting variety for agriculture or industrial transformation. Whereas a gene delivery program can produce several enhanced varieties a year. Moreover, transgenesis enables researchers to introduce interesting transgenes originating from different kingdoms (Animalia, Plantae, Fungi, Bacteria, …), a possibility that provides much more genetic diversity to improve crops. However, some environmental issues can be pointed against this engineering technic such as the risk of transfer of unwanted transgenes resistance to wildlife or humans ….
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences de la vie et de l'environnement

Texte_etudiant_1:
TRANSPOSABLE ELEMENTS

The transposable elements (TE, or more commonly called transposons) are mobile DNA sequences of variable length. The structure of a transposon is as follows : a central sequence is delimited at each side by repeated (identical) sequences. They can be classified into two main classes regarding the nature of those repeated sequences : (1) the DNA transposons which are delimited by terminal sequences orientated towards the same direction, and (2) the retrotransposons, for which the terminal sequences face each other. The difference between the DNA transposons and the retrotranposons also resides in the way they move in the genome. While the first ones move following a cut-and-paste process, the second ones are transfered to other regions of the genome following a copy-and-paste process.

The TEs can also be distinguished based on the content of their central sequence, which conditions their ability to move autonomously or not from their initial locus to a new one.
Texte_etudiant_2:
The discovery of the TEs in the maize genome by Barbara McClintock represents a great step forward into understanding the structure and dynamic dimension of the genome. It allowed scientists to finally understand how some genomes, no matter how close they were related one to another, could differ so much in their size. Indeed, the TEs make up for 50% of the human genome, and can represent up to 85 % of the big genomes of cereals. 

Moreover, the dynamism of the TEs has surely played (and will keep playing) a great role in the evolution of species. Due to their ability to insert themselves into a random genomic region, they indeed can alter or even unactivate genes.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences de la vie et de l'environnement

Texte_etudiant_1:
During internship in Olmix groupe, I realised experimentations of biostimulants on differents systems of production. Objectives was to test the diminution of pesticides in the field. With my superior and with help of three differents farmers, we tested differents formulations and combinaisons of biostimulant.The elaboration of biostimulants was possible with seewead juice and mineral composition. Seeweads was harvested twenty hours before transformation, they come in brittany's sea. In the field, we experimented four conditions. The first condition was the control (any pesticides and any biostimulants), the second condition with biostimulant, the third with pesticides and last one with combinaison of each produits. We took prelevements and we experimented the grow of plant and leaf and roots. We work with differents crops, for example wheat, corn and barley. On wheat, we observed differents dieases and the objectives of fungicides is to manage the fungus dieases. With experimentation, we took risque to use only biostimulant.

In some conditions, we mesured the photosystem activity of leaves with Spad Meter Material. To conclued the experimentation we harvested each crop during july and we tested mycotoxins in wheat and barley. The group promove sustainable agriculture and propose differents product (meat, vegetables) in restaurants. Seaweed permits to reduce pesticide in the field and pemits to reduce antibiotic in breed system.
Texte_etudiant_2:
The results show the benefic action of pesticides. The plants was healthy. With biostimulants, the plants was contaminated by differents diseases.

I think it is so difficult to contrôle disease with seaweed juice and biostimulants. The pesticides permits the food security for humanity. Also, it’s important to reduce pesticides for limite the pollution and limite human diseases. This internship was very interesting.

Texte_etudiant_1: During my IUT, i do my internship at the IFREMER, an institute about the marine research located in Brest. during 4 months i studied the survival of scallops larvae which have placed in differents growing conditions. The aim of this study was find a new type of breeding technical to improve the yield of larvae which reaches the adult age in hatchery. i worked on this in a laboratory  and in growth room with an research engineer and an other student in LP. We made breeding enclosures and each day we measured the numbers of death larvae and differents physicals and chemicals parameters in the enclosures. And to feed them we harvested micro algae.

Moreover i kept some contact and i think that it’s important for the network to find a job later. To finish i developed a critical spirit and since my redaction his better than before.

Texte_etudiant_1:
The GMO, genetically modified organisms, are subject to many controversies. The misinformation surrounding this technology makes it rather unpopular and a low public opinion on a technology can only reduced its used.  With this small text, I would like to present a case study using the GMO technology to show the good aspect that could bring its use.

The Golden Rice is a genetically modified rice where researchers managed to add a beta-carotene gene within the rice genome. Why?

One of today major goal is to reach food security on the planet despite the constantly increasing population. In India, where rice is the staple food, this goal is far from being reached. Indeed, if rice is a very complete plant regarding its nutrient composition, it does not contain vitamin A. The vitamin A deficiency can have several consequences. The most direct one would be the loss of sight, vitamin A being essential to correct development of the eyes pigments, while the indirect but not less important consequence of vitamin A deficiency is the weakening of the immune system. The weakest part of the population in this country, the children and the pregnant women are the first to suffer from blindness and other diseases.

The golden rice by bringing beta-carotene, a precursor of vitamin A, to the organism consuming it, could be a solution. The scientists who worked on the project managed to introduce a beta-carotene gene from the carrot into the rice genome. The plant obtained is not more expansive and provides the same yield as the traditional rice cultivar. Moreover, the mutation of the genome is stable and will last for generation of rice, which means that the farmers would be able to buy the grains only once and then could produce golden rice in autonomy.
Texte_etudiant_2: In my opinion, GMO technology is not more dangerous than any other technologies. For example, internet is a technology. Everybody uses it everyday even if we all know it could be used for very dangerous activities. GMO are the same. If we learn to use it properly, they could be an actual solution to reach food security.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences de la vie et de l'environnement

Texte_etudiant_1:
The epigenetic

The epigenetic, it's a modification of the expression to DNA, without genetic modification. It's a domain of study near to the genetic but it's very recente. The epigenetic gives  much informations. The epigenetic can be use in differents domains like the health, the research and other. It explains many things like the cat color "calicot" which is a modification epigenetic in the DNA of the female cat. For example, epigenetic is observed on the mouse, which are differents because the food eat by the mother. The epigenetic can have different form. In first the condensation of the chromatine which can silenced or activated differents genes. The histones can be modified by methylation, ubiquitination and other.

It existes many methodes in epigenetic like the Chip, which is a immunoprecipitation.
Texte_etudiant_2: For me this discover is really important because this allows to know more mecanism genetic, like the plant vernalization and the devernalization. It can be use in agronomy, genetic, medical research and many others fields. The plants use the epigenetic to resist against the global warming. It can modify the response to  some stresses, like drought stress, heat stress, light stress... The vernalization needs epigenetics modifications with methylation of the histone H3K27, which silence FLC gene and H3K4, which active the same gene. H3K27me3 silences the FLC which silence an important gene for the flowering , FT. The vernalization depend to the cold and the heat. The methylation depend to these stresses.

Texte_etudiant_1:
My scientific experience that I did was a master 2 internship at the Healthy Plant Protection Laboratory in Algeria.

our job is to study the disease in général and proposed solutions is to fight against this

Texte_etudiant_1:
I did an internship at Carlsberg Laboritory Research in Denmark. My subject was on the dry hopping and  hop breeding. Hops are an aromatic plant and it use on the beer to develop bitterness or to deliver aromatic oil to the beer. Normally, during the beer process, hops is add at the end of boiling step (15 minutes before the end). This method develop a bitter aroma because at this temperature all aromatic oils contains on hops is evaporate.

Now, the dry hopping consist to add hop pellets during the fermentation step. The temperature is around 15°C and aromatic oils stay on the beer. With this technique, we could create a lot of different taste. There is a lot of hops varietes with unique character.

The interresting part of this project was to test different hops with different yeast. The fermentation step need yeast who will eat sugar in the beer and producing alcohol. With the dry hopping, we add hop at the same time. During this experimentation, the development of flavor and aroma due to aromatic oil contains in hop pellets was totally different with the different yeast.
Texte_etudiant_2:
Thanks to this experiment, the best yeast was identifie, the yeast who develop a stronger and good aroma. Because certain yeast develop a bad flavour and taste. Add hops pellets during the fermentation step with yeast permise to develop more aromatic oil contain on hops pellets. This results is really interresting, that means we could use less hops pellets and have the same aromatics oils quantites on the beer, the same flavour and aroma. The price of hops pellets is really expensive (40 euro for 100g and we need 1 g for 1L of beer) so it's a possibility to decrease the price of the production.

Another good point of this experimentation is the huge possibility to create new flavour and new aroma on the beer. There is a lot of hops varietes and a lot of yeast, we could test a lot of combinaison and discover new flavor. Hops is really an interresting climbing plant and I think it's the future of beer development.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences de la vie et de l'environnement

Texte_etudiant_1: This year, we must realised a project in agronomy on the bean in order to derminate ascochyta's impact on this plants. We must calculated the leaf area before and after instalation of the desease. We have calculated the agressevity and incidence of this desease to have informations on its propagation in th agricultural system. That's why, we have done the mesures in the laboratory and in the field. In the laboratory, we have inoculated our bean plants to calculated leaf area, the lenght of the leaves. Moreover, we have realised a dissection of the apex in order to see the leaves numbers and to see the progression of this desease. Indeed, Ascochyta make necrosis on the leaf. So, the development of our plants can be affected and to stop. We have studied the seed of the CIPAN for evaluate its effects on the bean plants beacause this seed was present in the last year on the field.
Texte_etudiant_2: In this study, we have proposed a perfect protocol who we have permit to say what ascochyta could reduce the leaf area and the numbers of the leaves on the bean plants. We have see what ascochyta have been very fast, it has destroyed our plants in few days. On the field, the bean plants was attacked by bioagressor and our experiences have been really bad. To conclude, this experience has been very beneficial to my future life because the technical work and the reflexion are principals goals that director of my futur job wait. I learned to do correctly scientifical step and scientifical statistics.

Texte_etudiant_1:
In Medizin, gibt es eine Forschung die vielversprechend sieht : die Stammzelle. Die Stammzelle sind Zelle die, alle Zelle werden können : sie sind pluripotent. 


Die Benutzung könnten unendlich sein. Zum Beispiel, könnte diese Errinerung in Alzheimer Krankenheit effektiv sein. Es gibt noch keine Lösung gegen diese Pathologie.

Alzheimer Symptoms sind Speicherloss, Müde oder Zittern und die Pathologie ist die Konsequenz von Nervenzellesterbe.

Mit Stammzelle, würde es möglich neue Stammzelle in den Kopf zu spritzen um die gestorben Zelle zu ersetzen.

Stammzelle könnten auch benutzt sein in fast alles Pathologie. Man könnte Gelenkgewebe oder Muskelgewebe ersetzen.


Der grösser Vorteil mit der Entwicklung dieser Technologie ist das man braucht nicht mehr Embryo zu schaffen um Stammzelle zu haben. Man benutzen normale Zelle und die IPs Technik. Es gibt also noch weniger Ethike Probleme.


Es gibt aber einige Nachteile mit dieser Technologie. Stammzelle können alle Zelle werden und wenn sie nicht in die richtige Plätz entwicklen, könnten auch Tumor entwicklen.

Der Kosten sind auch eine Entwicklungschwierigkeiten. Heute, kostet der Protocol fast 200 000$ pro Person.
Texte_etudiant_2:
Meine Meinung nach ist es dass, es keine sinnvoll Gründe um diese Technik nicht entwicklen ist. Die Ethikeprobleme mit der Embryo Zerstörung sind vermeidet und die Konsequenz würden sehr positiv. Zum Beispiel, ist die Alzheimer Pathologie ein Drama für eine ganze Familie. Die Krankenheit ist lang und schwer.

Diese Technik hat schon gute Ergebnisse gegeben. Trotz, die andere Nachteile wofür sicherlich eine Lösung Forschern finden will, Stammzelle Entwicklung viel zu bieten hat.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences de la vie et de l'environnement

Texte_etudiant_1:
Ich möchte über ein größtes Fortschritt sprechen, das die Verbindung der Benutzung der Tiere in Labor ist. Es ist ein wichtig Problem, weil es 750 Millionen Tiere geschlachtet pro Jahre gibt. Tiere leben in Massentierhaltung mit kein Platz und Angst. Wenn sie Krank sind, nehmen sie viel antibiotisch und sind sehr gestresst. Sie bleiben in einem Käfig und sie werden quälen, um Testen zu machen. Affe sind sehr benutzen, weil sie genetisch nahr von uns sind. Sie sind Testen in Computer, zu machen zwingen. Um ihr Gehirn zu analysiert haben sie ein Metallstengen in der Kopf. Aber es ist nicht ethisch, Tiere zu schmerzenzufügen, um Kosmetisch für uns zu machen. Für unsere Bewusstsein müssten wir ein Alternative finden.


Ein Wissenschaftler hatte die Idee eine Biomikrochip zu bilden. Es ist ein elektronische Körper, die ein realistisch Körper vergleicht. Es ist mit einem Bioreaktor wählen, der realistisch Organ simuliert.
Texte_etudiant_2:
Danken an diese neue Technologie, wir können 80% weniger von Tiere Benutzung machen. Wir können ein kleine Körper für jede Menschen machen, und individuelle Medikament probieren. Wir werden fähig sein, die Haut zu synthetisieren und mit eine zuverlässig System zu testen. Affe sind nämlich nahr von uns aber sie sind trotzdem verschieden als uns.


Deshalb glaube ich, dass es eine gute Lösung ist. Für mich ist es nur positive Konsequenzen mit dieses Fortschritt. Wir können die Folter von Tiere stoppen und unsere Bewusstsein säubern.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences de la vie et de l'environnement

Texte_etudiant_1: Ich werde über der künstlichen Befruchtung sprechen. Heute, können nicht einige Person ein kind zu haben. Diese Person können adoptieren oder der künstliche Befruchtung Verwendung. Viele Eizelle sind von der Gebärmutter Extrakt. Das Spermium ist auch Extrakt. Dann, ist das Spermium in der Eizelle injizieren. Es gibt ein in vitro Fertilisation und ein Embryo schaffen ist. Der Embryo ist in ein Reagenzglas setzen und in die Gebärmutter einpflanzen. Jetzt, kann die Schwangerschaft wie ein normal Schwangerschaft fortsetzen.
Texte_etudiant_2: Der künstliche Verwendung ist eine sehr interessante Technologie. Das erlaubt ein Kind zu haben aber gibt es auch ein sehr Große Problem mit diesem fortschritt. In der Tat, gibt es ein Ethik Problem. Mit dem Künstliche Befruchtung können wir die körperliche Merkmale des Kindes wählen. Zum Beispiel, sind einige Eizelle für der Künstlichen Befruchtung extract. Welches Eizelle sollten wir nehmen? Wie können um ein Eizelle zu wählen ? Das Spermium für die Befruchtung kann auch wählen werden. In der Tat, existieren viele Samenbank mit ein Katalog um der Sperrspender wählen. Mit dem Künstlichen Befruchtung gibt es kein mehr Chance. Ich denke dass, es ein schlechte Sache ist. Außerdem, gibt es schon viele Kinder, die es aufgeben sind. Der Personen, die kein Kind haben können, sollen adoptieren.

Texte_etudiant_1:
Um Sport zu machen, muss man wie eure Körper Arbeit.

Die Elektromyographie (EMG) ist ein Test mit Elektrode, die eure Muskel Arbeit sehen erlauben.

Mit dieses Technologie, kann Sportler ihres Ausbildung optimiert.

In der Tat, man kann wenn ihres Muskel Arbeit wissen. Zum Beispiel in Bodybuilding, kann man ob ein Übung hilfreich ist wissen.

Dieses Technologie Arbeit mit Elektrode. Die Elektrode sind auf der Körper installiert. Sie sehen die Elektrik Impulsions die Muskels machen wenn Sie Arbeiten. Mit dieser Impulsions und mit die Intensität von dieser Impulsions, kann man die Intensität von die Muskel Arbeit sehen.
Texte_etudiant_2:
Meiner Meinung nach ist dieses Technologie eine groß fortgeschritten für die Sportler. In der Tät, mit dieses Technologie, hat Sportler ein besser Ausbildung.

Außerdem, hat Sportler eine besser Bewegung so ein besser Aufführungen.

Texte_etudiant_1:
Sozial Netzwerke Analysis :


Die Soziale Netzwerke Analysis (SNA) ist ein neue Methode der Ethologie. Ethologie ist die Wissenschaft, die Verhalten der Tiere studieren.

In der Nature gibt es vershiedene Interaktione zwischen die Wesen.

Die Tiere sind bei verschiedene Verhältnis verbinden.

Es ist möglich, diese Relationen zu studieren und analysieren. Die Forscher können die Stark dieser Verhältnisse quantifizieren, um ein Netzwerke zu zeichnen.

Das Netzwerk schauen die Verhältnis zwischen die Individuen der Population.

Das prinzipale Benutzung dieser Methode ist die Tiere Schutzung.

In eine Population gibt es Schlüssel-Individuen, die die meisten Individuen verbinden.

Diese Schlüssel-Individuen sind sehr wichtig für die Population Zusammenhalt.

Die Fërscher können diese Information benutzen, um eine Epidemie zu kontrollieren. Sie können also ein positive Verhalten fördern, um ein Population in Gefahr zu helfen : Sie machen die Schlüssel-Individuen das positiv Verhaltug lernen.
Texte_etudiant_2:
Die Soziale Netzwerke Analysis ist ein effektive Methode des Tiere Schutz. Meine Meinung nach diese Methode ist dass wir müssen öfter diese Methode benutzen.

Die SNA ist ein kostliche Methode weil brauchen sie Fieldeforsher, aber die Nutzen dieser Method sind mehrere.

Wenn das Netzwerke wird gern analysiert, die Schutzen kann sehr effektiv bekommen.

Um Beispiel gibt es das Kampft gegen ein Epidemie.

Wenn ein Epidemie ist in eine schwach Population detektiert, die Impfung der Schlüssel-Individuum ist shneller und billiger dann die Impfung der ganz Population. Es führt also weniger Stress in die Population.

So SNA ist vielleicht teuer zu führen, aber kommen viele Vorteile am Ende.

Die meiste Problem mit Tiere Schutz, oder Nature Schutz in general, nicht über Geld ist.

Es ist ein Problem die politike Wille. Es ist vielleicht ein bisschen utopisch, aber ich denke dass wir müssen mehr Geld in wichtige Problematike zu injektieren. Die Gesundheit, die Bildung oder der Natur Schutz sind vielleicht wichtiger dann die « Wirtschaft Wachstum » oder der « Land Schutz ».
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences de la vie et de l'environnement

Texte_etudiant_1:
Heuzutage haben wir neue Technologie verbessern. In der tat war das erste Computer IBM701 im 1952 geboren für die Armee.

Jetzt benutzen die Leute Computer, Handy und Programmen im Alltagsleben. Es ist sehr nützlich aber viele Forschern haben weiter zu gehen mit die künstliche Intelligenz vor. Sie möchten Maschinen, die wie ein Person denken, handeln und sprechen. Warum ? Vielleicht um die ältere Leute zu helfen oder die Forschung und die Gesellschaft Leben zu verbessern.

Die künstliche Intelligenz kann die bessere Spieler im Spielen (wie zum Beispiel : das Schach) toppen. Die Ingenieuren können Maschine, die von selbst lernen kann. Es ist deep-learning. So die künstliche Intelligenz kann die Leute observieren und lernen. Es kann im verschiedenen Situationen sich anpassen.
Texte_etudiant_2: Trotzdem wie kann man diese Phänomen kontrollieren ? Wenn die Maschine mehr Intelligenz als uns, könnten wir nützlich zu die Gesellschaft bleiben? Die schlechteste Szenario werden von „sci-fi“ Filmen gekommen. Die Maschinen werden die Menschen ablösen. Oder sie werden die Leute töten, um stärker und mehr selbständig zu werden. Wir haben Schwierigkeiten um unsere Gesellschaft zu verbessern, so wie könnten wir Maschinen mehr intelligent als uns handeln ? Auch was ist Intelligenz ? Schnell Lösung zu finden, sensibel sein, fast lernen ? Wenn ein künstliche Intelligenz geboren ist, was bedeutet ein Person sein ?
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences de la vie et de l'environnement

Texte_etudiant_1:
Ich werde über mein letzt Entwicklung Projekt sprechen. Es war eine bereichernde Erfahrung weil es war eine Gruppe Projekt, und haben wir unsere Fähigkeiten verbessern.

Zuerst, werde ich die Themen vorstellen : das Ziel ist das Suchmaschine von Vivastreet effektiver zu bekommen. In der Tat, ist es schlecht. Ursprünglich, sind die Suchen nicht relevant, und gibt es eine Schlüsselworten Betrieb, die fast nicht geht.

Dann, haben wir die Stufen von das Projekt teilnehmen. Zwei zu zwei, mussen wir einen Teil entwickeln. Der erst Gruppe kümmert sich darum die Anpassung das Suchmaschine für unsere Anwendung. Die zweite Gruppe abruft Artikeln des neues Suchmaschine und schafft einen neuen HTML Dokument mit diesen Artikeln. Der lätzte Gruppe kümmert sich darum das visuelle der software.

Zum schluss, haben wir unsere Arbeit vor der Klasse vorstellen, als würden wir unsere Programm verkaufen.
Texte_etudiant_2:
Diese Erfahrung erlaubte mir, neue Techniken zu entdecken. Außerdem, es war schön in groß Teams zu arbeiten. Es verbessert unsere Binden, und wir werden nämlich besser die nächste mal.
Es war wirklich interessant an mehreren Computer Sprachen arbeiten. Es war angenehm zu sehen dass hat unsere Projekt eine konkrete Applikation.

Texte_etudiant_1: Ich möchte von der künstlichen Befruchtung sprechen. Es ist ein Technisch wo eine Eizelle und Spermien wird entnommen. Danach werden die Eizellen in einem Reagenzglas befruchtet. Schließlich wird der Embryo eingepflanzt. Das ist eine alte Technisch weil, die Erste künstliche Befruchtung mit dem Mensch in 1789 mit dem Schottischen Chirurgen John Hunter war. Diese Methode ist genug einfach aber es gibt nur zwischen 10 und 15% Erfolg.
Texte_etudiant_2: Ich finde dass, künstliche Befruchtung ein Wirklichkeit Vorsprung ist. Diese Technisch ist nämlich eine Lösung für die Leute, die unfruchtbar sind oder für die Erbkrankheit. Außerdem ist es eine Lösung für die Frau, die allein sind aber auch für die Frauen Paar. Es ist heute ein wichtig Problem in Frankreich weil, diese Technisch für die Frauen Paar Verbot ist während ist es möglich in Spanien oder in Belgien. Einige Personen denken dass, künstliche Befruchtung nicht Ethisch ist aber ich denke dass, wir einen Körper haben und wir können machen was wir wollen. Niemand kann gegen den Wunsch nach einem Kind angehen.

Texte_etudiant_1: Alpha go ist eine künstliche Intelligenz, die go spielt. Sie won gegen das Beste Spieler den Welt, Lee Sedol. Was ist werklich interessante über diese programme ist das es deep-learning nutz. Deep-learning ist ein Art von programme. Es vewerde neuronal konnection. Es war nützlich für die go spiele, weil die Schlag possibilitates enormen sind. Also wie konnen nicht alles possibilitates suchen. Und danke die neuronal konnection sie kann lerne. Und danke das, und diese neuronal konnection, sie kann spiele nach spiele verbessert werden.
Texte_etudiant_2:
Das programme at Auswirkungen in drei Bereich. Die scientist Bereich, der go Welt, und die „normal“ menschen. Die spiele von alpha go gegen Lee Sedol war also die spiele von Programmirung gegen die laste Brettspiele in welche menschen won gegen Maschines. Und die wissenschaftlich geschafft war unglaublich genug für die Wet fesseln. Und es ist interessant zu wissen, dass Lee Sedol er will won denke. Und das Alpha Go waren werklich endet.

Und es interesst auch menschen wie haben kein interesst in informatik und go spiele. Und es bring die allgemeinen Interesse über die deep-learning und die neuronal konnection. Und es ist werklich gut für die Forschuung in diese Bereich.

Texte_etudiant_1:
Mehrere Boden sind Heute in Gefahr. Während Jarhzehnte haben wir die Boden mit Schwermetall versmutzen. Mehrere Schwermetall wären täglich benutzt, nicht nur im Industrie aber auch in Medizin oder um putzen.


Bis einige Jarhe, haben die Forsher eine neue Lösung gefunden. An diesen Boden, wollen Sie Pflanzen anbauen, die das Metal in irhen Blatt speichern werden. Dann, werden die Pflanzen wegbauen und trocknen, um das Schwermetall nicht mehr im Umwelt wird.

Wenn wir die Pflanzen nicht wegnehmen, könnten die Tiere diesen Pflanzen essen und vergiftet werden.
Texte_etudiant_2: Ich denke dass es gibt mehrere Gründen um diese Biotechnologie benutzen. Heute, brauchen wir immer mehr Nahrung um die Bevölkerung ernähren. Versmutzen Boden sind ein Problem für das Anbau, und die Zucht. Es gibt auch eine Gefahr für das Wasser, das wir trinken werden.

Texte_etudiant_1:
In Didactique haben wir in den zwei letzen Wochen über die Geburt der Zahlen gesprochen. Die älteste Dokumente, die wir haben, datieren von der Urgeschichte. Menschen haben Knochen von Tieren gefunden. Auf diesen Knochen finden wir kleine Striche. Das können wir uns als Zahlen vorstellen.

     Dann gibt es in Mesopotamie die Geburt von einem entwickelten mathematischen System. Dieses funktioniert mit einer Basis von 60. Das sieht sehr kompliziert aus. Wir haben Schulbücherbretter, die von 2000 vor JC datieren, gefunden. Wir wissen also, dass diese Personen die vier mathematische Operationen machen könnten. Aber auch mehr als das. Sie machten Gleichungen.

     Der größte Teil von der Dokumenten, die wir haben kommen aus Ägypten. Viele Papyrusrolle wurden hier gefunden. Die Ägypter benutzten diese Rolle für die Pflanzenkulturen, die Abentrennung den Feldern. Aber sie entwickelten auch reine Mathematik.

      Wir glauben immer, dass unesere Zahlen aus Ägypten kommen. Das ist aber falsch. Sie sind näher von dem chinesichen System. In China war die Mathematik sehr entwickelt. Sie benutzten Methoden, die wir heute noch in Systeme mit Gleichungen nutzen.

      In Südamerika finden wir etwas gennant die Quipus. Es ist Strikestücke mit Knoten. Die Maya benutzten es um zu rechnen. Sie berechnen in Basis 20 (sie rechnen mit ihre Hände und ihre Füße). Die Mathematik waren für si mehr als nur um zu rechnen oder um Sache zwischen Leute zu trennen. Sie machten auch Astronomie. Und hier sind auch Mathematik sehr nützlich.
Texte_etudiant_2:
Ich glaube, dass es sehr wichtig ist, zu wissen woher Mathematik kommt. Viele Schüler mögen nicht oder hassen Mathe. Sie sehen es nur als etwas schwer und ohne Bedeutung. Aber zu wissen, dass es seit so viele Jahrhunderte existiert, gibt vielleicht mehr Sinn. Zu wissen, warum benutzen uns diese Zahlen, warum wir machen so oder so, ist wirklich interessant. Vielleicht würde es einige Schüler interessiert und sich mit Mathe aussöhnen.

     Ich bin überzeugt, dass wir müssen die Geschichte der Mathematiken lehren. Es würde Sinn zu diesem Fach bringen.

Texte_etudiant_1:
Der Unvollständigkeits Lehrsatz von Kurt Gödel. Es gibt wahren mathematische Probleme, die wir nicht demontrieren können. Das sagt dieser Lehrsatz. Warum ist es wichtig ?Weil für ein Mathematiker demontrieren alles essential ist. Diese Lehrsatz war ein gross Entdeckung. Er hat viel andrer Lehrsatz gebrochen. Im Physique kennen wir die Welt befolgen, aber in Math müssen wir  alles erklären und schreiben. Gödel sagt am die Esrte mall dass auch in Mathmanchmal nicht alles controllieren konnen.

Natürlich sind dickköpfig die Matematiker und wir testen alles Problem zu demontrieren. 1+1 =2 bliebt 1+1=2, aber es war ein Bruch in ein gross block von schwierige Lehrsatz  und solide Demonstrationen. Und Gödel fortspottet die Logik. Er demontriet dass es viel verschieden Unendlichen gibt und viel klein Beitrag. Heute wir benützen immer diese Lehrsatz.
Texte_etudiant_2: Kennen-Sie dass wie viel andere Mathematiker Kurt Gödel war ein perturbiert Menschen ? Heute will ich uber die Konzequenz uber die Familie und Freunde von Mathematiker spreche.  Wir sind 1933 wen er geht nach USA. Er ist ein  Österreiche Mathematiker und das Krieg will kommen.Mit irhes Frau sie ausziehen in Princeton. Er trifft wichtig Wissenschaftler und war Freund mit Wissenschaftler wie Einstein. Ihre Arbeinten war um Rätsel zu beleuchten. Aber es war ernst  Verantwortunge auch. Einstein mit der Atombombe zum Beispiel, ein beteutend Entdeckung und ein furchtbar Waffe für die Period. Gödel denktet dass er war immer gehörten. Die Logike ist ein Bereich sehr Complexe und störend. Mit der Druck und Insecuritat enden  viel Wissenschaftler wärhend Krieg narrich. Ich denke dass Wissenschaftler ist ein wichtig aber schwerig Responsabilitat. Sie brigen neues Technologie aber controllieren sie nicht alles Anwendung .  Heute für Menschen die Frage ist müssen wir alles testen / machen.

Texte_etudiant_1:
Im Jahr 2019 ist die Entwicklung des Maschinelles Lernens und besonders des Tiefes Lernens schon beeindruckend.

Tiefes Lernen ist an lineare Regressionen basiert, es heißt es ist ein Stochastischer Prozess. Nach meiner Meinung ist Tiefes Lernen jetzt besserer als unser Gehirn.

                Ein Tiefes Lernnetzwerk besteht normalerweise ein paar Hundert Neuronen aus. Diese Nummer ermöglicht ein paar Konzepte um zu lernen. Nehmen wir das Beispiel des Erstellung von Künstliche Bilder. Ein Computer musst jeden Teil des Gesichts ernennen.

Einander Beispiel ist selbstfahrender Autos. Das Programm unterscheidet Leute, Autos, Baume, Fahrraden und viel mehr.

Sowie mit Babys braucht eine Maschine nur Beispielen um zu lernen. Allerdings sagen die Spezialisten, dass die Lernmechanismen sind sehr ähnlich.
Texte_etudiant_2: Meiner Meinung nach steht, das mit so viel Neuronen als in unser Gehirn kann man sehr einfach ein Programm, das komplexer als unser Gehirn ist. Aber dieses Programm werde sehr unvorhersehbar sein. Allerdings, weniger als ein Tausend Neuronen sind genug um zu sehr chaotisch Problemen zu Lösen (z.b. in Meteo oder (Bio)Chemie). Doch sagen Wissenschaftler, dass seine Programme sind schon sehr komplex und unvorhersehbar.

Texte_etudiant_1:
Ich lerne Physik in der Universität Rennes 1. Es ist mein zweites Jahr in der Uni, aber ich habe mein erstes Jahr in Lorient gemacht. Ich mag Physik weil es eine elegant und wichtig Wissenschaft ist, um die Natur zu verstehen. Physik ist nicht nur mathematisch! Wenn man Mathematik studiert, muss man nur die Formulen benutzen! Troztdem braucht man auch Intuition, wenn man einen gut Physiker bekommen möchtet. Die Sache der Physiksklassen sind plural : wie lernen Theory von die Transport der Wärme zu die Rechte des Strom oder die Bewegung der Planete. Physik ist auch eine experimental Wissenschaft : es ist möglich, dass wir nicht nur in die Buchen lernen ! Um unsere pratisch Fähigkeiten zu verbessern, arbeiten wir zwei Stunde pro Woche in der Labo. Es gibt mehrere interessant Experimente zu tun! Zum Beispiel letzte Woche habe ich mit meinem Labo-Partner über die Schnelligkeit der Lichte gearbeitet!


Letztes Jahr haben die Physiker von das Ligo Experiment die Gravitationswellen entdecken. Gravitationswellen ist Energie, die durch den Raum reist. Sie kommen auf zwei sehr massiv Objeckte, die zusammenbrechen haben.

Um diese Entdeckung zu machen haben die Physiker einen sehr kleinen Lichtstrahl benutzen. Wann die Gravitationswellen durch die Erde kreuzen sind, haben diese Lichte – die zu andere Bewegung reagieren nicht auf – bewegen.
Texte_etudiant_2: Meine Meinung über die Entdeckung ist, dass es eine wichtig Entdeckung ist. Albert Einstein hat die Gravitationswellen auf seine Theory vorersagt. Es ist eine neue Zeit für Physik, die Possibilität, andere Entdeckung mit die Gravitationswellen zu machen sind zahlreich !
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences et proprietes de la matiere

Texte_etudiant_1:
Es war einmal, 200 jahren vor J.C, ein griechischer Wissenschaftler der auf Ägypten leben. Ihr name war Eratosthène und er war sehr intelligent und neugierig. Er wollte dem Umfang der Erde rechneng. Um diese zu finden er geht nach Syène wo es ist wisst das am Mittag den 21. Juni, die Sonne scheint im ein Brunnen. Eratosthène verstehst das bedeutet, dass die Sonne perfekte verticale  mit der Erde war, und dass  das Licht zum Mittel der Erde vorbeit. 

Am selben Tag  in Alexandrie wurde sein Freund der Winkel der Schatten des Leuchtturm messen.

Es war 7.2° (ein Fünftigtel eines Kreises), Eraosthène, mit diesem Messungen zeichnet ihr eines Bilt um das Problem bessere zu verstehen und mit Geometrie-Theorem es gibt dass der Winkel zwischen Syène und Alexandrie zum Mittel der Erde und der Winkel sein Freund messt gereichen sind.

Es bedeutet dass die Distanz zwischen Alexandrie und Syène ein Fünftigtel der Erste messt.

Die letzte Sache braucht war die Distanz zwischen Alexandrie und Syène zu wissen. Eratosthène wollte, dass der Man mit Kamel in die Wüste um die Distanz zu messen reist. Ein Kamel geht zu Syène im 50 Tagges und geht 100 Stadien am Tag, es bedeutet die Distanz ist 5000 Stadien, es bedeutet dem Umfand der Erde ist 50 mahl Grösser, 250 000 Stadien, auf Ägypten ein Stadium ist 157.5 m, Eratosthène findet dem Umfang der Erde war etwa 39 375km. Das Richtig Messungen ist etwa 40 000km.
Texte_etudiant_2: Ich finde das es ist sehr überraschend wie Mathematik kann die Welt bessere zu verstanden, und braucht klein öder etwa kein Sachen zu fonctionnieren,  nur Trick und Wissenschaft. Man wisst der Erde Runde war, aber für jahren glaube dass es nicht war.

Texte_etudiant_1:
Sehr viele Krankheiten werden mit medizinischen und biologischen Möglichkeitengeheilt.

Der medizinische Fortschritt führt zu einer bessere Lebensqualität und die Menschen leben länger. Die erhöhte Lebenserwartung hat viele Vorurteile für alle und natürlich auch für die Frauen, die später Kinder haben wollen. 

Die Frauen warten selbständig zu sein, Karriere zu machen und Geld zu verdienen, um ein Kind zu bekommen. 

 

Aus diesem Grund, wenden sich einige Frauen an die medizinisch assistierte Fortpflanzung und die künstliche Befruchtung. Diese Technologie hat verschiedene Etappen. 

 

Zuerst werden eine Eizelle und Samenzellen entnommen. Dann geschieht die Fertilisation. Die Zellen werden befruchtet. Ein Embryo wird geschaffen. Zum Schluss, werden die Embryonen eingepflanzt.
Texte_etudiant_2:
Diese Fortschritte der Medizin in unserer Zeit sind ohne Zweifel beeindruckend. Doch haben diese unbestreitbaren Fortschritte der Medizin zahlreiche neuen Probleme entstehen lassen. Vor allem werden ethische Probleme aufgeworfen, besonders was die Reproduktionsmedizin betrifft. 

Die natürlichen Beschränkungen scheinen aufgehoben. Man kann verstehen, dass ein Arzt annimmt, einem jungen sterilen Paar zu helfen, wenn es ein Baby bekommen möchte. Trotzdem können wir die künstliche Befruchtung in sich selbst in Frage stellen : wenn eine alte Frau, die keinen Mann hat und, die ihre Fruchtbarkeit längst verloren hat, ihr Kinderwunsch erfüllen will, kann man sich fragen, ob es Perspektiven für das Kind gibt. Hat ein Kind nicht das Recht in einer Familie aufzuwachsen, die sich um es lange kümmern kann ? 

Sollen die Ärzte die Grenzen von der Natur überwinden ?
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences de la vie et de l'environnement

Texte_etudiant_1:
This year, with the university we do a project on an scientific experience in group of seven person. It was a new experience for me, a new good experience.

First the teacher put at random 13 groups to do an little projet together. I learn to work with people didn't know. Besides we search a question to ask them and a name for the group.

Secondly we disperse the differents roles with all etudiants of the group, for me "banlieue 13". There are a chief, he cordinate the people. There are also a people can expain what do the people in the band, he write a logbook. this is my role The are peoles charges to do the experiment and two others to modelise the experiment. A people very important is the person can redige the project with the result, can explain the experiment, the question... The last role is the people can present the project in front of all the group and teacher in a amphitheater. A have a presentation document to show the experiment and results.

Moreover our question is on the coefficient of restitution fordifferents  balls can fell on differents supports. We toke four balls, a bouncing ball, a ping pong ball, a tennis ball and a small ball in glass. We chose two supports to toke mesures, a solid soil and grass. For all mesures, we toke video to modelise after some courbe.

We redige a report. It was very complete, we began to explain the question and how can do the experiment. We do boards, pictures, courbes and a small conclusion.

To conclude this experience was very good to work in group and it is importante experience to continu to advance in the life.
Texte_etudiant_2: It is a good experience.

Texte_etudiant_1:
In chemistry, there are so much experitment to understand the world and how it works but I choose a simple experitment to make copper in evidence.

When we have a liquid in chemistry  and that we want to proove the presence of copper in this solution, we can put in a nail of iron,  and if we have copper in it we will observe a sediment of copper on the nail. Why have we a sediment on the nail ? Because the potentiel electric of the couple Cu2+ / Cu is higher than the potentiel electric of the couple Fe2+ /Fe. In chemistry the potentiel electric allows us to preview an reaction before really doing it. In chemistry this couple of iron and copper are couple redox so a oxidant react with a reducer in exchange of electron. In the solution Cu2+  give an electron to Fe and this reaction given copper and Fe2+ in an exchange of electron.
Texte_etudiant_2: This experitment wich allows to see if there are copper in a solution or not can be useful in the chemistry industry to see if there are copper on a machine or in the water or any solution which can be contaminated by any form of copper. Copper which can be dangerous in many experitment or for human and animals life. This experitment is convenient, and can be realise with not much materials in disposition, it is not hard to make this result so  much doing this experitment than another one for the same result.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences et proprietes de la matiere

Texte_etudiant_1:
Today, I talk about an scientific experiment, when in class we have make our Aspirin®. At the university we have practical work several times a week and this week we have synthesize the aspirin thanks to the acetic anhydride and the salicylic acid. 

For this experiment we have use the process developed in 1975. It is rather easy and consists of the esterification of the hydroxyl function of salicylic acid with acetic anhydride, in an acid medium. 

To start we have be levied the start product, we have insert in a ballon and we have heat the mixture. Then we have filter the mixture to recupered the Aspirin. But now we don't have the final product, to get it we cleaned the product obtained with ethanol and water before filtering it again. 

Then we weigh and we test the point of fusion of our apsirin to control the product formed. We have formed a good product because we obtain a 69% yield.
Texte_etudiant_2: This experience has been rewarding for me because drug manufacturing is an area of particular interest to me.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences et proprietes de la matiere

The electric car was an invention of the year 2010's that needs electricity to move. There are 2 types of electric car that are hybrid and 100% electric. Hybrid have a system to operate with electricity and fuels.

On the point of view of the electric type, the batteries that car possess are limited to a few hundred kilometers of autonomy. Then it is necessary to recharge the battery with the help of electric terminal installed at home for example.

It is important to note that these cars pollute much less than diesel or gasoline cars. This has been experimentally proven.

Texte_etudiant_1:
I am going to talk about graphene. It was discover in 2004 by André Geim and Konstantin Noveselov in the University of Manchester in England. They have received the Physic Nobel Price in 2010 because they have isoled a piece of graphene.

Graphene is a two dimensional material so it is flat. It is thick of one atom of carbon, it is a nano scale and atoms are organized in hexagonal motif.

Graphene is a new material. It is flexible, light, high-resistant and transparent. If we mix it with tin, the material can be insultator or supraconductor.

Nowaday, scientists still research a way to extract graphene at least cost. We obtain graphene thanks to graphite.

In a near futur, we can use it for tranparent and flexible screen for phone, computer or television. We already see it but the price of this objects are really to expensive.
Texte_etudiant_2:
I really love this new material because the posibility of use it hught. Scientists still research ways of use, so maybe thanks to my study and when I going to be graduate I can help to find new posibilities.

I want one day be able to use transparent screen and put my phone in my pocket and not break it.

It is going to be good to transport computer more light because today they are still heavy.

It thanks to an oral about graphene thats I know for sure that I love science.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences et proprietes de la matiere

Texte_etudiant_1:
I learn about chemistry. So now I will talk about an experiment that I have done last week. The field is chemical industry. Our class have to product Aspirin - an important substance of many medicaments, with salicylic acid and ethanoic anhydride. 

At first, we add some gram of salicylic acid in an erlenmeyer then put it in a water bath (70°C). Then we add some milliliter of ethanoic anhydride with concentrated sulfuric acid (which acts as a catalyst, increase the reaction speed). We keep heating the erlenmeyer for 20 min. While heating, the temperature increases, the chemical transformation is faster.

After that 20min, we have to crystallize the product. We stop the water bath and add some cold water to destroy the excess of ethanoic anhydride, which reacts with water to form ethanoic acid. 

The last thing to do is purification of aspirin (recrystallization). We recrystallize the obtained crystals in ethanol then put some hot water to dissolve the impurities. At last, We let it cool in an ice-cold water bath : aspirins recrystallizes
Texte_etudiant_2: According to this experiment, we can calculate the yield of the rection. We can also learn about IR spectra or RMN spectra of aspirin (acetylsalicylic acid).
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences et proprietes de la matiere

Moreover, these manipulations allowed us to know how to eliminate a compound from a solution. It is necessary to be careful during these experiments because the accidents can arrive very quickly, it is necessary to take precautions, like for example to hold the test tube, in which one makes the mixture of compounds, with a pincer.

After that, we had a solution and we needed to know what that solution was, based on the results of previous experiences. This part is more complicated to realized.

And finally, we can estimate the concentration of each compound in this solution.
Texte_etudiant_2:
For this experience you need to have a lot of knowledge, to know what gives two solutions that react between them.

These experiences give me a taste of the style of job that I could practice later. This experience is rewarding.

Texte_etudiant_1:
The test that i am going to describe is the creation of comestible and colour glasses. This test is easy to realise whith the necessary equipement.

    At the first step, we must to do a metals mixture. The colour is done by the using metals. For example if we use niquel, the glass is going to be yellow or if we use copper, is going to be blue. We mix this metal with another whit metal who is abble to react with the colour metal at high temperatures. So this glass is comestible beacuse this metals are meltings whith humidity

    Secondly, we put the metals mixture in a oven at 900°C so that te metals can be react. When is it molten, we put out the mixture, we put the liquid on a brass spuport, beacause the fusion temperature of the brass is very high. And we crush the liquid with brass piece. We must to make that very quicly because if the liquid mixture is not crush whith brass quicly, the liquid cristalise. We can not have glass if the liquid cristalise.

   To finish, we must to look if the glass is well done and not cristalise. So that, we use a rayon X diffraction. If the glass is well done, when we pass an echantillon in the RX, we must observe pics on the diagram. In effect, the glass is well stucture so the RX can traverse and create pic. If the glass is not well done and we create cristal, the RX diagram do not present pic. The cristal is not well structure so RX can not pass in the cristal and do not provoc pics.

    So, we can create comestible and colour glass whith only two mtals and a very powerfull oven.
Texte_etudiant_2: not time

The electro-chemical battery is one of the discovery of the twentieth century that can change our future.

In fact, the electro-chemical battery consist in using water to « make » electricity. Thanks to the electro-potential of the duo water (H2O) and dihydrogen (H2), we can, with a tension, convert dihydrogen into water and water into dihydrogen. This conversion, or oxydo-reduction reaction, liberate some electrons that are able to move in an electric circuit and here we are the battery is create and can be use.


This discovery make the link between two scientific domains : physics and chemistry.

We use the physics properties of the electron to make the circuit and the chemical properties of the oxydation and reduction of water and dihydrogen to produce electrons.

Texte_etudiant_1:
Being in a earth sciences domain, at the beginning of the year my class and I went to a little city called Montbrun-les-Bains un the south of France. After a few classes of cartographic basics, it was time for us to do it in real life, to see what it is like to be on the field.


The aim of this trip was to recognize a couple of series of rock, and identify which ones belongs to which period of the earth time. And then, being able to report everything we saw on a map, and create a geological map of a place we've never been before.


For 10 days, we had to wake up every morning a 7 to be ready at 8 to walk through the fauna and flora, climbing mountains, against the wind or the sun or the rain, and walk around 5 to 10 kilometers per day, until 6pm. The field was around 12m^2 and rocks we studied about were sedimentary.


All of us, geosciences students, were separate into little groups of 2 people. My partner and I were watching out and paying attention to all the rocks around us. When there is a « in place » serie, we had to take a « pendage » which means the angle of where the serie is directed compared the geographical north pole. By taking all those « pendages », we noticed that, from the north of the field to the average center, the series were making a syncline. Here’s our first element of our map ! An syncline, with all the younger rocks in the center and, symmetrically, going to the oldest. 


We tried to understand the south of the field but failed, it was too complicated for us, debutants in cartographics. After finishing our map, we learnt that the south were in discordance, which means news deposits were placed into the olders rocks eroded. 


After all of that, we went back to our homes, tired of walking and climbing and thinking about what happened in the south.

Texte_etudiant_1:
We report the sythesis of acetylsalisylic acid (or aspirin) by few different steps.

Firstly, we synthesize the two product of the main reaction. It consist of putting together salisylic acid and acetic anhydrid in a balloon and we heat it to around sixty degrees in a water bath during 30 minutes. Then, when all the products are mixed together by heat, we put in on a filter; which is under pressure and called “Buchner filter”.

Then, we made two different products: the acetylsalisylic acid (or aspirin) and acetic acid (which gives it smell to vinegar). Our next step is to separate these two products to purify then later. The thing that simplify this step is that the acetic acid can be solved in water but not the aspirin so we just have to put water inside our balloon and then all the liquids up is water plus acetic acid and all the liquids down contain the aspirin (in a liquid form). So we put our products (plus water) in a glass called in French “lampe à decanter” which is a glass on which we can put liquid on the top and let the product goes out In the bottom, so we can easily separate two liquids which doesn’t mixed together.

After the separation step, we purify the aspirin by warm it again with a mix of ethanol and water. The mix will extract from the aspirin the traces of water and products from the beginning, which doesn’t react. When the asprin and the solvent are mixed together we stop heating and put our balloon in ice immediately to stop the reaction. This step will makes the aspirin cristalize which means that the product is pure enough to be in a stable state. We just have to put the mix on the Buchner filter again and take the cristals.

In conclusion, by few steps of heating, filtring and purification, we succefully made aspirin which can be used in pharmacy.

Texte_etudiant_1:
During this year’s first semester, me and a classmate chose a topic related to  materials’ evolution through the ages, for a project on one of our Engineering classes.

Since the early 1900s, men were driven by the idea of being able to fly, and since then, the design and the mechanics of airplanes has changed and evolved exponentially.

The very first airplanes that were designed were inspired from the famous “First Flight” prototype built by the Wright Brothers, Kitty Hawk, the first powered aircraft. These planes were all made of wood, because of his incredible resistance and thickness; although through the years the goal set by aeronautical engineers, was to improve the capacities of the aircraft, reduce fuel consomption and more importantly, reduce the weight of the aircraft.

Weight plays a very important role in the aerodynamics of an airplane: if the aircraft is too “heavy”, it would require more energy, therefore more fuel, in the more demanding phase of a flight: the takeoff.

Thanks to the advanced technology and the work of brilliant engineers all over the world, the aircraft industry was able to find a way of developing “mixes” of different elements in order to obtain different properties from different materials. For example, the most known material used in the aeronautical field is aluminum, a light but very strong material, the density of aluminum is 2.7, as in it is 2.7 times more dense than water. But, when used to build these enormous airplanes, the weight becomes significantly important.

Which is why, engineers started to develop composite materials. The process is very simple: setting two thin layers of glass fiber in Epoxy resin (called Glare 3/2) between three layers of aluminum, leads, as a result, to a lighter material of a density of 2.34.

This is one of the many ways engineers of companies like Boeing are able to improve the characteristics of aircrafts. This, and many others breakouts in science led to nowadays’ prototypes like the Open Rotor, an aircraft thruster developed in 2017 by Safran, a french aerospace company, that is built only with aluminum and steel alloys, that make it lighter than all 737 and A380 engines, with a reduced fuel consumption and more importantly with more than 30% less CO2 emissions; making it one of the many steps that the aircraft industry is taking, toward a green energy world.
Texte_etudiant_2:
This project made me realize how much i am interested and invested in the engineering world. Because one of the many qualities that an engineer mind must have, is to be able to think outside of the box and to have a large imagination, cause these kinds of ideas are the ones that at first are thought of as impossible or even laughed at; but in the end they are the solution to a better world.

Just look at Elon Musk for example, he went from ending up in debts because of his "meaningless" investments, to being one of the most recognized brilliant minds of our time.

Texte_etudiant_1:
The Aspirin synthesis


The aspirin is a medicine and its synthesis is important for the pharmaceutic industry.


The mechanism of this synthesis is quite simple but it require heat and light.

The first step is to create a phenol with as reactive a benzene. The phenol is a benzene who has an alcohol function on one of its carbon. This reaction is hard so we need to synthesis the cumene first and then we had the phenol. The step two is an aromatic electrophil substitution between the phenol and a dibrom. Then we use magnesium, carbon dioxide and water and the product of these multiple addition is a benzene who had an alcohol function and a carboxylic acid function on two of its carbon. This reaction take place in an acid space.

With these steps we have synthesized the salicylic acid.


The last step of this synthesis is the reaction between the salicylic acid and an ester (the acetic anhydride). For this reaction, we put both of the reactive in a balloon and we heat the balloon at the temperature of 55 °C. When we heated the solution, there is a gaze formation and we used a reflux heater for transform the vapor in liquid. Then we put the balloon on the ice and we filter the product.

The last manoeuvre is purification and for that we put with the product ethanol and water. After we heat again and we filter the melange. The final product is a white powder who is called aspirin.


The aspirin is used in our everyday life’s. You can take it when you had a headache or a stomachache or when you are in physical pain and you need to feel a little better.

This medicine is an inhibitor molecule and its replace the nor-adrenaline in the synapse. Like that you don’t feel the pain linked to your sickness. You are pain free for couple hour.

Texte_etudiant_1:
Maritime transport takes a huge place in the international market and globalization. That is why, industry of boats has increased a lot these last decades. Many engineers work in order to improve the performance of cargoes. The problem that they had to solve was because of the contact between steel, sea and oxygen, it creates oxidation. They created an anode, made of zinc, which protects the steel. So, the question is: How this anode does it work?


First of all, we have to have a look on the reactions. Steel is commonly named with its atomic symbol: Fe. There is a red-ox reaction caused by the difference between the O2’s potential and Fe’s one. In that way, we have: Fe → Fe2+ + e- and O2 + H+ + 4e- → 2H2O.

Steel is not still steel. It becomes ions. With O2, it is transformed in Fe(OH)2, a red oxide.


Then, the fact that sea water is salted, there are the ions: Na+ and Cl-. They increase conduction and the share of electrons. Therefor, oxidation of Fe becomes more important.

So, it was necessary to find a way to reduce or stop this corrosion.


We have seen that scientists invented the anode made of zinc. How does it protect our steel?

Zinc (Zn) has a smaller electric potential than Fe. Indeed, in red-ox, the oxidant “attacks” the reduction which has the most negative potential. Therefore, O2 reduces Zn whereas Fe and boats are protected and safe!



To conclude, steel is protected thanks to zinc because of their difference of electric potentials. On order to avoid corrosion, a piece of zinc is melted on the steel.
Texte_etudiant_2:
According to me, the invention of the sacrificed anode had a huge impact on the maritime market. Their life-during increased, their maintenance price decreased. It favours globalization.

Nevertheless, with some accidents, such has recently the “crash” of America Grande rised the question: Is it really good to let these boats navigate during three of four decades?
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences et proprietes de la matiere

Texte_etudiant_1:
Let’s talk about chemistry history.

By the end of Middle-Age, Alchemistry was a wide spread trend. People apprehended matter as divided into four categories (or elements), distinct one from the others. They distinguished “water”, “earth”, “fire”, and “air”. It was impossible to pass from one to the other, unless we used what people called a Philosopher Stone. Only this could allow you to turn something from one element into an other. Obviously, everyone wanted to discover this very special stone. In fact, it could not only transform silver in gold, but it could also heal any illness. It was a very valuable thing, but at the end, no one found the recipe and it became a legend. Step by step, as scientists made experiments, alchemistry slowly turned into what we now know as chemistry.

One of the most famous experience that made alchemistry turn into chemistry is the experience of the grown tree. A Dutch scientist had the idea of putting a tree into a pot, and watering it. He started his experiment, assuming that water was of the “water” element, and the tree was of “earth” element since once it dies, it turns into dirt. That being set, he measured the weight of dirt in the pot, the weight of the tree itself and the amount of water he put everyday. I can’t recall the exact numbers, but after 5 years, he stopped the experiment, and measured again. The dirt in the pot was of almost the same weight, he had used a lot of water, and the tree had grown a lot, but not enough to meet with the weight of water used. He proved thereby the existence of what he called “Sylvester gas”, and destroyed the theory of matter divided into four elements. It was the first step to discover Photosynthesis.
Texte_etudiant_2: History is interesting, and discovering never stops.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences et proprietes de la matiere

Texte_etudiant_1:
Solar Impulse : tomorrow’s challenge


During these last few years environment has taken a bigger place in our lives and this is one of the main challenge the world has to face in the future. In the same time the growth of the world’s population and the travelling people around the world, push developers to explore different kinds of transports. How can we combine these two areas ? The Solar Impulse is one first step in what we can do with environment and transport.


First of all, the first prototype of Solar Impulse was released in 2009. The main goal for its creators was to built a plane entirely autonomous in energy. The pane does not need any fossil fuel to fly, but only the energy offered by the sun. To convert this solar energy (radiation) into electricity, the wing’s plane are recovered by solar panels made of silicon. These wings are made of different layers. The photons presents in the sun radiation interacts with the electrons presents in the layers. Thanks to an intern process electricity is created. Finally, create electricity is not that hard ; but to being able to fly a long distance, the plane needs to create electricity in mass.



In addition of producing electricity the plane has got an other challenge to face : autonomy which is directly linked to safety ; of course we do not want the plane to be forced to land in the ocean or in the Houston as the captain Sully did in 2009. At the beginning, the Solar Impulse could made only short travels and mostly during the day when there is more sun. It is true that they had to find a solution to being able to fly during the night when there is no sun at all. After few tries they decided to add big batteries (four) on the wings to stock the energy produced during the day but not used. That way they achieved their first world’s tour in July 2016. Finding a plane able to travel all around the world in an ecological way is a real breakthrough. The next step today will be to built a Solar Impulse for commercial flight.


Last but not least, the challenge of tomorrow is to create a plane on the Solar impulse’s model to transport passengers from a town to another, with a not to high cost.

The problem today is that commercial planes are bigger and bigger and the rapport of their weigh and their surface is to short. In fact, if we want to transport as many people as in actual commercial flight, the future solar plane will need a huge surface to welcome a lot of solar panels. Of course such a weigh (plane and passengers) needs a big quantity of energy. Today all these challenges are not compatible and developers need to find THE idea which can change the future. As an aeronautic fan, I am looking forward for that day. It would be a date to remember for sure.
Texte_etudiant_2: It was enriching fro our skills.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences et proprietes de la matiere

Texte_etudiant_1:
Quantification of energy has always been a key idea in physics and is now teach practical classes of physics. An experiment to understood this abstract concept is the analysis of light using diffraction. It is based on the fact that lights rays are emit by atoms when they desexcites, liberating energy. It goes to a final quantum state of energy from an initial quantum state and free energy under the form of a particle of photon, which is a no mass particle.

The purpose of the experiment is to use the diffraction of the light emits by a hydrogen luminescent tube to find the quantification states of the hydrogen atom for each quantum number. This technique involve a goniometer, which is a device that diffract light with a network and then gives us the angular diffraction of fundamental rays of this particular light. Furthermore the atoms are excite by an electrical field, it passes in the tube filled with gaze of the element we are working on and by giving energy to them as so detestation appears as they cannot stay excite.

First to start on the hydrogen state of energy we need to find a crucial parameter: the number of string of the network that diffract the light. So we know the light rays he emits by the mercury element and can retrace their wave length, we are using a mercury luminescent tube to determine the parameter. Thanks to a physical formula including this wave length, the number of string and the sinus of the angle of the diffracted light obtained by the goniometer, we are able to approach this number and continue the experiment.

In a second time, we replace the mercury tube by a hydrogen one and repeat the process through the goniometer. At this time we are just able to pick up the values of the angle of the rays and using the same formula as the first part of this experiment we can calculate the final wave length.

Moreover other formulas of physics help us is our research of the values of energy as well as Energy=(Plank constant*speed of light)/wave length. The energy here is the variation between the initial and the final state and using mathematical deductions we found the values of energy for each state of quantum number for the hydrogen atom.
Texte_etudiant_2: This was a very interesting experiment to work on.
Domaine_de_specialite: Sciences et proprietes de la matiere

Texte_etudiant_1:
I'd like to talk about the reactive oxygen species (ROS). 


       They are molecules created after the use of oxygen in our body. They oxygen is combinated with hydrogen or carbon and create a new reactive molecule.

There are a lot of ROS in our live and they lead to different consequences on the body.

       Firstly, ROS are induced in signaling pathway, to help to produce energy in the mitochondria, ATP. They can be able to stimulate enzyme, such as adenylate cyclase, to convert ATP to AMPc and lead to liberation of intracellular calcium. The calcium induce many signaling pathway, in the muscular cell, for instance, it provides excitation and contraction.

        In a second view, ROS induce the apoptosis signal in the cell. They permit to expose molecules in cell membrane and to liberate enzyme, such as lizozyme, from the lisosome organite, to distroy the alterated cell. It increases the destruction, and alterates many organites to accelerate the processus.

        What's more, we discover that ROS are involved in degenerating diseases, such as Alzheimer. ROS are able to make mutations on the DNA and for instance, in the bêta-amyloïde peptid, they develop this phenomenom and the degeneration gets out of order.


       To conclude, ROS are involved in many signaling pathway in our body, they have positive and negatif impact and they are a beautiful research' subject.

To my mind, ROS are very complicated to study, but essential to understand how signaling pathway, and diseases work.

Texte_etudiant_1:
X-Ray Imaging

It’s hard to imagine proper and correct diagnosis and treatment of injuries as common as fractures without X-ray imaging technology. X-Rays were accidentally discovered when a German physicist Röntgen was studying the process of electric current passing through a gas of extremely low pressure. He observed that in a darkened room, the cathode ray tube covered with barium platinocyanide caused a fluorescent effect. Since the cathode rays are invisible, he didn’t know what the rays were and named it X-radiation for its unknown nature. He won the first-ever Nobel Prize in Physics in 1901 for his discovery. The initial reception to the discovery, however, was met with hostility and mockery with a New York Times journalist referring to it as "an alleged discovery of a method to photograph the invisible".

On my point of view, X-ray imaging are an amazing invention but when it was invented, the scientists did not know the adverse effects of the X-Ray.

To conclude, X-Ray imaging developped a lots the medical knowledge and help the physician to made a diagnosis on many diseases but with have to use it carefully to to avoid the misuse.

the invention of the stetoscope :


Before the stetoscope was invented,  doctors would listen to their patient’s heartbeats by putting their ear to their chests.  For instance, if there was considerable insulation between the actual heart and exterior of his chest in the form of fat, this method failed.  Exactly, one such situation was faced by French physician Laênnec, when he couldn’t judge the heart rate of one of his patients on account of too much fat on him. He invented the stethoscope as a wooden trumpet-shaped tube that amplified sounds coming from lungs and heart. That principle of sound amplification hasn’t yet changed till date.

Texte_etudiant_1:
I would like to take about the regeneration of the entire human epidermis using transgenic stem cells. Scientifs performed a therapy genetic using stem cells of a little boy. This child has a genetic disease : Junctional epidermolysis bullosa. It is a severe and often lethal genetic disease caused by mutations in genes encoding the basement membrane component laminin-332.

Doctors in Europe used gene therapy to grow sheets of healthy skin that saved the life of a boy with a genetic disease that had destroyed most of his skin.

This was not the first use of the treatment, which adds gene therapy to a technique developed to grow skin grafts for burn victims. But it was by far the most body surface ever covered in a patient with a genetic disorder: nine square feet.

The boy’s disease, junctional epidermolysis bullosa, causes extremely fragile skin that blisters and tears, and is prone to infections and skin cancer. He had been expected to die but has recovered. Two years after the treatment, he continues to have healthy skin and lead a normal life. A video provided by the medical team shows the boy, Hassan, playing soccer with his father. According to news reports, the family is originally from Syria.

Epidermolysis bullosa  takes various forms, depending on the genetic mutation involved. About 25,000 people in the United States have the condition, and 500,000 worldwide. The severity varies, but some patients spend much of their lives covered in bandages and in severe pain.
Texte_etudiant_2:
This could be the beginning of the treatment of Junctional epidermolysis bullosa (JEB) ?

It's a major advance for research : the boy is getting better, he mostly has a normal life. Nevertheless, we can't treat his mucous membrane.


Then, this research can be criticized because :

- The treatment could be more efficient in children because their stem cells are more efficient than adults.

- Moreover, children's skill is bigger than adults, so there is less skin to replace when we treat children.


Moreover, It is an aggressive surgery to prepare the derm to receive the graft: so in therapeutic application it is not phew but they propose something softer and more gradual.


Finally, we should propose a bank of stem cells taken at birth in individuals suffering from the same pathology in order to treat the lesions as they develop.
